name: comic-pile
description: Dice-Driven Comic Reading Tracker - FastAPI + HTMX + Tailwind CSS

scripts.lint:js: sh -c 'if ls static/js/*.js >/dev/null 2>&1; then npx eslint static/js/*.js; else echo "No JavaScript files to lint"; fi'
scripts.lint: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:html
scripts.lint:fix: sh -c 'if ls static/js/*.js >/dev/null 2>&1; then npx eslint static/js/*.js --fix; else echo "No JavaScript files to fix"; fi'
